item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

4/1/2013's location will be:

BAR

Known for being a big name in New Haven Style Pizza and brewing their own Beers, BAR is a part Restaurant, part Pub, part Night Club located on Crown Street.  They also sport a pool table for those interested, but there may be a wait for that.

No Special Deals this time, just whatever BAR is running on the night.

AJ will Host this meetup.  He can be reached at 315-345-9348 if you have trouble finding the group or have questions.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

ATTENTION: As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website. We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will take donations at upcoming Happy Hours. Anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated! Please see AJ, Devorah, or Jason at an April Happy hour Thanks!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... it's a come-whenever-you-want kind of thing.

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the host listed in the description, or attempt to call them. (Read patiently if you haven't found it yet it's probably in there.)
item.name: Happy Hour - BAR - 4/1
